name: part_006
file: tmp_【#大空スバル４周年】新衣装お披露目！！！！！４周年ありがとうございました！！！！！！！！：NEW 3D COSTUME !!! 4th anniversary Live【ホロライブ】 [n6yep2gl1HY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru performs the song 'Fansa' in her new 3D costume during her 4th anniversary live.
MC section where Subaru talks about her new costume and its design details.

subtitles.original: 恋しちゃってください！
subtitles.english: Please fall in love with me!

subtitles.original: やれること何でもします
subtitles.english: I'll do anything I can

subtitles.original: NG無しで体当たり挑戦
subtitles.english: Taking on challenges head-on with no NGs

subtitles.original: エゴサで見つけたアンチのコメ
subtitles.english: Anti-comments I found while ego-searching

subtitles.original: ふざけんな誰よりわかってるし
subtitles.english: Don't mess with me, I know better than anyone

subtitles.original: でも大丈夫　ここに立てばみんながいる
subtitles.english: But it's okay, when I stand here, everyone is here

subtitles.original: いくよ！
subtitles.english: Here I go!

subtitles.original: 好きになって！もっと！
subtitles.english: Love me! More!

subtitles.original: 私を見て！もっと！
subtitles.english: Look at me! More!

subtitles.original: 恩返しは“愛のこもった投げキッス”で
subtitles.english: My way of giving back is with a "blown kiss full of love"

subtitles.original: 虜にする！もっと！　夢を見せる！もっと！
subtitles.english: I'll make you fall for me! More! I'll show you dreams! More!

subtitles.original: 楽しんでって
subtitles.english: Enjoy yourself

subtitles.original: “愛のこもったスペシャルナイト”
subtitles.english: It's a "special night full of love"

subtitles.original: ファンサしちゃうぞ（・ω＜）
subtitles.english: I'm gonna give you fanservice (・ω<)

subtitles.original: お手紙も書いてください！
subtitles.english: Please write me letters too!

subtitles.original: 何度も読んで宝物にします
subtitles.english: I'll read them over and over and treasure them

subtitles.original: スキャンダルまだ早いけど
subtitles.english: A scandal is still too early

subtitles.original: 裏切りません！宣言しときます（｀・ω・´）
subtitles.english: I won't betray you! I'm declaring it now (｀・ω・´)

subtitles.original: 嫉妬や嫌がらせには負けない
subtitles.english: I won't lose to jealousy or harassment

subtitles.original: ふざけんな実力で勝ってやる
subtitles.english: Don't mess with me, I'll win with my own skills

subtitles.original: だから辞めない負けず嫌い私はいる
subtitles.english: So I won't quit, I'm a sore loser, I am here

subtitles.original: いくよ！
subtitles.english: Here I go!

subtitles.original: こぶし上げて！もっと！　汗をかいて！もっと！
subtitles.english: Raise your fists! More! Work up a sweat! More!

subtitles.original: 恩返しは“愛のこもったスパビーム”で
subtitles.english: My way of giving back is with an "ai-filled Suba-Beam"

subtitles.original: 大歓声！もっと！　まだまだ！ねぇ？もっと！
subtitles.english: A huge cheer! More! Not yet! Right? More!

subtitles.original: 受け止めてね
subtitles.english: Please accept it

subtitles.original: “愛のこもったわがままソング”
subtitles.english: A "selfish song full of love"

subtitles.original: ファンサしちゃうぞ（・ω＜）
subtitles.english: I'm gonna give you fanservice (・ω<)

subtitles.original: はぁ…終わりが近づく　寂しいね
subtitles.english: Haa... the end is near, it's lonely, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 楽しいのに泣きそうだよ
subtitles.english: Even though it's fun, I feel like crying

subtitles.original: 次も次もまた会えるよね？約束！
subtitles.english: We'll meet again next time, and the time after that, right? It's a promise!

subtitles.original: 今日はみんなのおかげで最高の4周年になりました！
subtitles.english: Thanks to everyone, today has become the best 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: 本当に本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you so, so much!

subtitles.original: 優しさに溢れている言葉も
subtitles.english: Words filled with kindness

subtitles.original: 心無い誰かの言葉さえも
subtitles.english: And even the heartless words of someone

subtitles.original: 必要（なんだ）必要なんだ強くなろう
subtitles.english: Are necessary, they're necessary, let's become stronger

subtitles.original: 好きに叫べ！もっと！　楽しんじゃえ！もっと！
subtitles.english: Shout as much as you like! More! Just enjoy it! More!

subtitles.original: 忘れないで特別な日になりますように
subtitles.english: Don't forget, may it become a special day

subtitles.original: 共に歌おうずっと！
subtitles.english: Let's sing together forever!

subtitles.original: 共に歩もうずっと！
subtitles.english: Let's walk together forever!

subtitles.original: 合言葉はとびっきりのＬＯＶＥ
subtitles.english: The watchword is the very best L-O-V-E

subtitles.original: 好きになって！もっと！　私を見て！もっと！
subtitles.english: Love me! More! Look at me! More!

subtitles.original: 恩返しは“愛のこもった投げキッス”で
subtitles.english: My way of giving back is with a "blown kiss full of love"

subtitles.original: 虜にする！もっと！　夢を見せる！もっと！
subtitles.english: I'll make you fall for me! More! I'll show you dreams! More!

subtitles.original: 楽しんでって
subtitles.english: Enjoy yourself

subtitles.original: “愛のこもったスペシャルナイト”
subtitles.english: It's a "special night full of love"

subtitles.original: ファンサしちゃうぞ（・ω＜）
subtitles.english: I'm gonna give you fanservice (・ω<)

subtitles.original: はーい！というわけで、ファンサでしたー！
subtitles.english: Alright! So, that was Fansa!

subtitles.original: みんな、どうですか？この可愛い新衣装ー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, how do you like this cute new costume!

subtitles.original: 可愛いでしょ！
subtitles.english: It's cute, right!

subtitles.original: ちょっと…はぁ…ちょっと待ってね。ふぅ、ふぅ、ふぅ…
subtitles.english: Wait... ah... give me a second. *Panting*

subtitles.original: スバルもね、テンション上がって全力で踊っちゃったからさ！
subtitles.english: Subaru got so hyped up that I danced with all my might!

subtitles.original: はい、というわけでですね、この最高な新衣装は
subtitles.english: Alright, so this awesome new costume was

subtitles.original: スバルの母ちゃん、しぐれうい母ちゃんに作ってもらいましたー！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: made by Subaru's mother, Shigure Ui-mother! Yay!

subtitles.original: どうどうどう？
subtitles.english: How is it, how is it?

subtitles.original: スカートも可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: The skirt is cute too, right?

subtitles.original: これね、スバルのおすすめポイントその1！この可愛いリボン！
subtitles.english: This is Subaru's recommendation point number one! This cute ribbon!

subtitles.original: そしてその2！みんなね、なんか見たことあるなーと思う人いるんじゃないでしょうか。
subtitles.english: And number two! Everyone, I bet there are people who think they've seen this somewhere before.

subtitles.original: そうなんです！この衣装ですね、新衣装のスバルの新衣装、
subtitles.english: That's right! This costume, the new costume, Subaru's new costume is...

subtitles.original: あのアイドル衣装のね、進化バージョンとなっておりまーす！
subtitles.english: a powered-up version of that idol costume!

subtitles.original: ということでね、このズボンなんかもうね、なんか見たことあるなーという…
subtitles.english: And so, these shorts too, you might think you've seen them...
